chapters.title: Chapter 54: The Sending
chapters.info: Caraighan Maconar, p. 673 (949)—Legendary Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She once brought a man about 2000 miles to Tar Valon to be gentled after he had killed her Two Warders. She is also credited with quelling the Comaidin Riots at a time when she had no Warders. She is considered the archetypal Green sister.
